channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nintendo Is ‘Actively Assessing’ What a Trade War Means for the Switch 2
item.description: Nintendo of America president Doug Bowser tells WIRED the company is still figuring out how to address tariffs that could make the company’s priciest ...

item.title: UK’s demand for Apple backdoor should not be heard in secret, says court
item.description: A UK surveillance court said the backdoor order targeting Apple iCloud can be heard partly in public.

item.title: The Switch 2’s GameChat Social Feature Could Revolutionize the Way You Play With Friends
item.description: GameChat allows up to 12 players to game together and is limited to friend lists as an added layer of protection.

item.title: AI video startup Moonvalley raised a fresh $43M, SEC filing shows
item.description: Los Angeles-based startup Moonvalley, which is developing AI tools for video creation, has raised a fresh $43 million in venture capital, according to...

item.title: 14 Best Bookshelf Speakers (2025): Active, Passive, and Hi-Fi
item.description: Soup up your sound with these active and passive speakers. We have picks for every budget.

item.title: An IVF Alternative Could Make Having Babies Less Onerous
item.description: Startup Gameto has developed a technique for maturing eggs outside the body that’s showing promise at helping patients get pregnant with fewer hormone...

item.title: IBM acquires Hakkoda to continue its AI consultancy investment push
item.description: IBM on Monday said it has acquired Hakkoda, a data and AI consultancy based in New York. The acquisition would “further expand” IBM’s ability to bring...

item.title: Best Wireless Earbuds, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: Ready to cut the cord? These are our favorite buds that will never, ever get tangled.

item.title: SignalFire raises over $1B as LPs embrace data-driven investing
item.description: Thirteen years ago, when Chris Farmer founded early-stage venture firm SignalFire with data analysis at the core of its investment strategy, many were...

item.title: Krea raises $83M to be the one-stop shop for genAI creatives
